title: Elk Grove police K-9 injured in gunfight Saturday night
content:
ELK GROVE, Calif. (KCRA) —
An Elk Grove police K-9 was shot during a gun battle between robbery suspects and police Saturday night, the department said.
Elk Grove police responded to an armed robbery at a Jamba Juice near W. Stockton Boulevard and Dunisch Road about 8:30 p.m.
Two suspects fled on W. Stockton Boulevard shortly after the robbery.
An officer with a K-9 tried to stop two men who matched the suspects' descriptions a short time later, but one of the men opened fire, police said. The dog was shot and an officer returned fire, according to the Elk Grove Police Department.
The K-9 is expected to survive.
Two suspects were detained a short time later, and they were wounded during the officer-involved shooting, police said.
A third person was detained in a vehicle that was parked in the area where the other suspects were located.
Stay with KCRA for updates.
